verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: South Korean President Moon Jae - in and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: held] [ARG1: a surprise meeting] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARGM-PRP: in an effort to ensure that a high - stakes summit between Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump takes place successfully.</p] >

< p > South Korean President Moon Jae - in and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un held a surprise meeting on Saturday in an effort to [V: ensure] [ARG1: that a high - stakes summit between Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump takes place] successfully.</p >

< p > South Korean President Moon Jae - in and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un held a surprise meeting on Saturday in an effort to ensure that [ARG1: a high - stakes summit between Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: takes] [ARG2: place] successfully.</p >
